name: Wangan Warrior X - Supporter Pack
detailed_description:
If you'd like to further support the development of Wangan Warrior X then the Supporter Pack is for you! We have added some cool goodies for the players that will make the Supporter Pack worth it.

The supporter pack includes wallpapers for desktop and mobile, official soundtrack in the highest quality (AAC, MP3, WAV), and concept art of various beta development.

Official Sound Track (OST)


Info
  • All songs from the in-game soundtrack, completely at your finger tips in three formats of the highest quality!
  • MP3 320 Kbps
  • AAC 320 Kbps
  • Uncompressed WAV 32Bit

Track List
  • No Sense - Original Track (05:51)
  • Faillin' - Original Track (05:28)
  • Drone - Original Track (01:14)
  • In Trance - Original (01:40)
  • Trancelvania - Original Track (01:34)
  • Deep Dance - Original Track (01:31)
  • The Festival - Original Track (01:05)
  • War Dance - Original (01:12)
  • You Don’t Love Me - Original Track (03:55)
  • The Touch of House- Original Track (02:40)
  • I Wanna Dance - Original Track (01:55)
  • Neon Lights - Original Track (02:29)
  • Wave of Synth - Original Track (02:32)
  • Joy Of Night - Original Track (02:12)

High Quality Wallpapers

  • Desktop (1024 x 768, 1280 x 720, 1920 x 1080, 2560 x 1440, 2880 x 1620, 3840 × 2160)
  • Mobile - Android (411 x 731, 1080 x 1920, 1440 x 2560, 1440 x 2960)
  • Tablet - Android (800 x 1280, 1200 x 1920, 1536 x 2048, 2560 x 1700)
  • Mobile - Apple (640 x 1136, 750 x 1134, 1080 x 1920, 1125 x 2436)
  • Tablet - Apple (768 x 1024, 1536 x 2048, 2048 x 2732)

Official Unreleased Concept Art

  • All concept art and beta pictures are included in various resolutions.
  • Development pictures and sketches.

short_description: The supporter pack includes wallpapers for desktop and mobile, official soundtrack in the highest quality (AAC, MP3, WAV), and concept art of various beta development.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD, Radeon HD)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
